T02D2008a:215a-1: shr'i badzra ma h'a bhee ra ba s'a dha na /
T02D2008a:215a-3: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2008a:215a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2008a:215a-5: mun nag lta bu'i sku 'dzin zhing //
T02D2008a:215a-6: nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can //
T02D2008a:215a-7: gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams //
T02D2008a:215a-8: bdud dgra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2008a:215a-9: bde gshegs bka' ni bsrung ba dang //
T02D2008a:215a-10: gdug pa gdul bar bya ba dang //
T02D2008a:215a-11: thar pa thob par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2008a:215a-12: sgrub thabs 'di ni brtsam par bya //
T02D2008a:215a-13: dur khrod dang ni chu bo'i 'gram //
T02D2008a:215a-14: shing gcig dang ni mtshan gcig sogs //
T02D2008a:215a-15: dbang dang dgug sogs gnas der bya //
T02D2008a:215a-16: dang por rang snying zla ba la //
T02D2008a:215a-17: rang gi sa bon bsam par bya //
T02D2008a:215a-18: 'od zer bla mar rang lha rnams //
T02D2008a:215a-19: gsal byas phyag 'tshal mchod sogs bya //
T02D2008a:215a-20: tshang ba'i bzhi yi bsam gtan ni //
T02D2008a:215a-21: byams pas dgra zun mnyam por dmigs //
T02D2008a:215a-22: snying rjes sdug bsngal bral bar bsgom //
T02D2008a:215a-23: dga' bas thar pa thob par dga' //
T02D2008a:215a-24: btang snyoms yal bar mi 'dor ro //
T02D2008a:215a-25: de nas stong pa'i byang chub bsgom //
T02D2008a:215a-26: ra ba dra ba sbyor bar bya //
T02D2008a:215a-27: ma yi bu las skyes pa la //
T02D2008a:215a-28: sems kyi sa bon bsam par bya //
T02D2008a:215a-29: sna tshogs rdo rje bsam gtan bya //
T02D2008a:215a-30: de steng h'um las gsal spros pas //
T02D2008a:215a-31: gdung rnams bgegs ni sel byed pa //
T02D2008a:215a-32: rdo rje ra dang bla re ni //
T02D2008a:215a-33: sngags 'di yis ni bsgom par bya //
T02D2008a:215a-34: aom sum bha ni su ma bha h'um phat /
T02D2008a:215a-36: grihna pa ya grihna pa ya h'um phat /
T02D2008a:215a-37: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'a na badya r'a dza h'um phat /
T02D2008a:215a-38: rdo rje'i sa la nam mkha' ni //
T02D2008a:215a-39: bha ga'i dbyings su bsgom par bya //
T02D2008a:215a-40: dbus su yam ram bam dang lam //
T02D2008a:215a-42: de steng sum las ri bo ste //
T02D2008a:215a-43: bhr'um las gzugs kyi bdag po bsgom //
T02D2008a:215a-44: de yongs gyur las gzhal med khang //
T02D2008a:215a-45: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2008a:215a-46: rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa la //
T02D2008a:215a-47: / dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang //
T02D2008a:215a-48: ka ba brgyad kyis yang dag spras //
T02D2008a:215a-49: phyi rol dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor //
T02D2008a:215a-50: shing brgyad kyis kyang mdzes par byas //
T02D2008a:215a-51: tshig pa dang ni ma tshig pa //
T02D2008a:215a-52: dum bur gyur dang ma gyur pa //
T02D2008a:215a-54: cang chen btsugs dang shing la sbyangs //
T02D2008a:215b-0: @215b bandha pu ta li la sogs //
T02D2008a:215b-1: shing brgyad la ni gnas pa'o //
T02D2008a:215b-2: srin po ro langs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs //
T02D2008a:215b-3: sha za'i gdon can brgyad po ni //
T02D2008a:215b-4: bya rog 'ug pa tshogs kyis bskor //
T02D2008a:215b-5: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su ni //
T02D2008a:215b-6: dang po'i yi ge sogs pa la //
T02D2008a:215b-7: zla bas brgyan pa'i chu skyes bsam ;
T02D2008a:215b-8: / dbus su bzhi pa'i bzhi pha la //
T02D2008a:215b-9: dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan pa bsam //
T02D2008a:215b-10: de la ral grir gyur pa dang //
T02D2008a:215b-11: ral gri lte bar de nyid bsam //
T02D2008a:215b-12: de yongs gyur pas 'jam dpal bsams //
T02D2008a:215b-13: gur kum mdog ni gzhon tshul can //
T02D2008a:215b-14: ral gri g-yas la autpala g-yon /
T02D2008a:215b-15: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab mdzes pa //
T02D2008a:215b-16: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
T02D2008a:215b-17: de ltar byang chub lnga bskyed nas //
T02D2008a:215b-18: ma las bskyed pa'i nyi ma ni //
T02D2008a:215b-19: de yi snying gar bsgom par bya //
T02D2008a:215b-21: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams //
T02D2008a:215b-22: rig pa'i lha mo khro tshogs kun //
T02D2008a:215b-23: spyan drangs nyi ma la bzhugs bsams //
T02D2008a:215b-24: de nas 'jam dpal de nyid dang //
T02D2008a:215b-25: de bzhin gshegs kun gcig tu gyur //
T02D2008a:215b-26: 'od kyi gong bu de las ni //
T02D2008a:215b-27: 'bar ba dpag tshad brgyad stong khyab //
T02D2008a:215b-28: de gyur sems kyi sa bon las //
T02D2008a:215b-29: 'od zer lnga ldan kha dog nag 'od zer spro dang bsdu ba bya //
T02D2008a:215b-30: de gyur rdo rje gdengs pa ni //
T02D2008a:215b-31: kha dog nag por gyur par bsam //
T02D2008a:215b-33: rgyal sras gtso bo la sogs kyis //
T02D2008a:215b-34: nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba ni //
T02D2008a:215b-35: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas bsams //
T02D2008a:215b-36: sems can khams ni rnams sbyangs nas //
T02D2008a:215b-37: slar byon rdo rje'i gzugs la zhugs //
T02D2008a:215b-38: rdo rje chen po yongs gyur nas //
T02D2008a:215b-39: rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs //
T02D2008a:215b-40: ma he'i gdong can zhal dgu pa //
T02D2008a:215b-41: phyag ni sum cu rtsa bzhi phug / g-yon brkyang g-yas bskum brgyad gnyis zhabs //
T02D2008a:215b-42: phat kyi sgra can gsus pa 'phyang //
T02D2008a:215b-43: spyi gtsug thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2008a:215b-44: stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing //
T02D2008a:215b-45: klu brgyad kyis ni rgyan du byas //
T02D2008a:215b-47: ha ha zhes dgod ljags bskyod cing //
T02D2008a:216a-2: tshangs pa brgya byin tshogs za ba //
T02D2008a:216a-3: rtsa zhal ma he'i gdong can khro //
T02D2008a:216a-4: rva yi bar na gnas pa'i zhal //
T02D2008a:216a-6: steng zhal ser po cung zad khro //
T02D2008a:216a-7: ral pa zur phud lnga dang ldan //
T02D2008a:216a-8: gzhon nu'i cha lugs 'chang ba po //
T02D2008a:216a-9: g-yas pa'i rva la brten pa'i zhal //
T02D2008a:216a-10: dang po mthing ga 'jigs par byed //
T02D2008a:216a-11: gnyis pa mdog dmar khro bo'i zhal //
T02D2008a:216a-12: gsum pa ser po cung zad khro //
T02D2008a:216a-13: g-yon pa'i rva la brten pa'i zhal //
T02D2008a:216a-14: dang po dkar po rmongs par byed //
T02D2008a:216a-15: gnyis pa dud ka khro bo'i zhal //
T02D2008a:216a-16: gsum pa nag po ljags dril ba ;
T02D2008a:216a-17: / g-yas g-yon gnyis kyis glang po che'i //
T02D2008a:216a-19: g-yas pa'i phyag gis rim pa bzhin //
T02D2008a:216a-20: kar ta ri dang bhi ndi pa la dang //
T02D2008a:216a-21: gtun shing chu gri ka na ya //
T02D2008a:216a-22: sta re mdung dang mda' dang ni //
T02D2008a:216a-23: lcags kyu dbyug to kha tv'am ga /'khor lo rdo rje thob dang //
T02D2008a:216a-24: ral gri dang ni cang te'u 'dzin //
T02D2008a:216a-25: g-yon pa'i phyag gis go rims bzhin //
T02D2008a:216a-26: thod pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang //
T02D2008a:216a-27: phub chung rkang pa zhags pa dang //
T02D2008a:216a-28: gzhu dang rgyu ma dril bu dang //
T02D2008a:216a-29: lag pa mi lpags rtse gsum me yi thab //
T02D2008a:216a-30: thod tshal sdigs mdzub ba dan rlung ras 'dzin //
T02D2008a:216a-31: g-yas kyi zhabs kyis go rims bzhin //
T02D2008a:216a-32: mi dang ma he glang bong dang //
T02D2008a:216a-33: rnga mo khyi lug wa brgyad mnan //
T02D2008a:216a-34: g-yon pa'i zhabs kyi go rims bzhin //
T02D2008a:216a-35: bya rgod 'ug pa bya rog dang //
T02D2008a:216a-36: seng ge khra dang bya rgod chen po dang //
T02D2008a:216a-37: ne tso krung krung brgyad po mnan //
T02D2008a:216a-38: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02D2008a:216a-39: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser //
T02D2008a:216a-40: rang gi snying gar bzhugs pa yi //
T02D2008a:216a-41: snying la nyi ma'i lte ba las //
T02D2008a:216a-43: rdo rje bsdu bcings byas nas ni //
T02D2008a:216a-44: gsang sngags 'di yang brjod par bya //
T02D2008a:216a-45: aom ae h+ya hi bha ga b'an /
T02D2008a:216a-46: ya m'anta ka a'a gtstsha ya /
T02D2008a:216a-48: mdun du byon par mos nas ni //
T02D2008a:216a-49: rang gi sngags btab mchod ma //
T02D2008a:216a-50: spos dang me tog byug pa dang //
T02D2008a:216a-51: mar me la sogs mchod bstod bya //
T02D2008a:216a-52: aom ya m'anta ka aargham pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2008a:216b-0: snying po'i @216b mjug la btags la dbul //
T02D2008a:216b-1: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing //
T02D2008a:216b-2: dgug cing gzhug la dbang du bya //
T02D2008a:216b-3: gshin rje gshed po'i nga rgyal bya //
T02D2008a:216b-4: mig dang rna ba sna dang lce //
T02D2008a:216b-5: lus dang de bzhin yid rnams la //
T02D2008a:216b-6: sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02D2008a:216b-7: nam mkha'i snying po spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2008a:216b-8: sgrib kun sel dang kun du bzang //
T02D2008a:216b-9: ming gi yi ge dang po bskyed //
T02D2008a:216b-10: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bsam //
T02D2008a:216b-13: bde gshegs rnams ni spyan drangs mchod //
T02D2008a:216b-14: bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa yis //
T02D2008a:216b-15: spyi bor blugs nas dbang bskur bya //
T02D2008a:216b-16: rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che //
T02D2008a:216b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2008a:216b-18: yam dang ram bskyed rlung me'i steng //
T02D2008a:216b-19: thod pa aa las bskyed pa yin //
T02D2008a:216b-20: nang na bdud rtsi lngas gang ba //
T02D2008a:216b-21: h'um zhes pas ni dag par bsam //
T02D2008a:216b-22: a'a: yis rtogs bya aom gyis bar //
T02D2008a:216b-23: lus kyi dkyil 'khor mnyes par bsams //
T02D2008a:216b-24: rdo rje lce yis 'jib par bsam //
T02D2008a:216b-26: stong pa'i sgra brnyan tshul du bya //
T02D2008a:216b-27: sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba ni //
T02D2008a:216b-28: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2008a:216b-29: rtsa ba'i snying po nye snying bsam //
T02D2008a:216b-30: dus bzhi yi ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D2008a:216b-31: g-yeng ba med par bsam gtan bya //
T02D2008a:216b-32: skabs su ston mo bza' bar bya //
T02D2008a:216b-33: lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i rim pa'o /
T02D2008a:216b-35: // / sngags pa gzhan la phan brtson pas //
T02D2008a:216b-36: dbang dad dgug dang bsad pa dang //
T02D2008a:216b-37: bskrad dang dbye ba rmongs la sogs //
T02D2008a:216b-38: rgyud las byung ba bzhin du bya //
T02D2008a:216b-39: de las 'dir ni drag po'i las //
T02D2008a:216b-40: 'khor lo'i las dang sbyin sreg dang //
T02D2008a:216b-41: bsam gtan gyi ni sbyor ba rnams //
T02D2008a:216b-42: las 'di dag gis brtsam par bya //
T02D2008a:216b-43: bla ma smod sogs dam tshig med //
T02D2008a:216b-44: theg pa chen po smod pa dang //
T02D2008a:216b-45: sngags kyi rgyud la 'phya ba dang //
T02D2008a:216b-46: bsad dang bskrad dam rings par byed //
T02D2008a:216b-47: snying rje yis ni ngan song las //
T02D2008a:216b-48: bzlog par bya ba gzhan las min //
T02D2008a:216b-49: sngags pas sngon du bsnyen pa ni //
T02D2008a:216b-50: bye ba bzlas nas las rnams brtsams //
T02D2008a:216b-51: yang na mtshan ma thob nas bya //
T02D2008a:216b-52: gzhan du byas na 'jig rten bcas //
T02D2008a:216b-53: dkyil 'khor bris sku mdun du ni //
T02D2008a:217a-1: por mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02D2008a:217a-2: snang mdzad kyis ni lus la byugs //
T02D2008a:217a-3: zhim pa'i chang ni btung bar bya //
T02D2008a:217a-4: skra bshig gcer bu byas nas ni //
T02D2008a:217a-5: nam phyed da ma ru dkrol bya //
T02D2008a:217a-6: brkyang bskum tshul du gnas nas kyang //
T02D2008a:217a-7: lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis //
T02D2008a:217a-8: ha ha zhes dgod rtse gcig pas ;
T02D2008a:217a-9: / ma yengs pa yis gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D2008a:217a-10: de nas 'jigs pa chen po skye //
T02D2008a:217a-14: dngos grub gang 'dod ces gsungs pa //
T02D2008a:217a-15: yid la gang 'dod gsol ba gdab //
T02D2008a:217a-16: de nas las rnams brtsam par bya //
T02D2008a:217a-17: mar gyi ngo la sngags pa yis //
T02D2008a:217a-18: dur khrod ras ni blangs nas su //
T02D2008a:217a-19: dag par bkrus te brkyang bar bya //
T02D2008a:217a-20: sum pa'i sbyor bas mtshams bcad nas //
T02D2008a:217a-21: wa yis rtogs pa'i lhag ma la //
T02D2008a:217a-22: snang mdzad dur khrod thal ba dang //
T02D2008a:217a-23: 'bras bu thug bcas par rang la byugs //
T02D2008a:217a-24: brgyangs nas mdun du bzhag nas ni //
T02D2008a:217a-25: skra bshig gcer bur byung nas su //
T02D2008a:217a-26: lho phyogs su ni kha bltas la //
T02D2008a:217a-27: ma he'i gdong gi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2008a:217a-28: ras dang snag tsha'i rdzas rnams la //
T02D2008a:217a-29: lag pa reg nas gsang sngags ni //
T02D2008a:217a-30: 'bum phrag gnyis su bzlas pa bya //
T02D2008a:217a-31: nyi ma phyed nas bzung nas su //
T02D2008a:217a-32: 'khor lo bri bar brtsam par bya //
T02D2008a:217a-33: bya rog sgro rtsa'i snyu gu yis //
T02D2008a:217a-34: bcu drug rtsibs can gnyis byas te //
T02D2008a:217a-35: g-yas dang g-yon skor tshul gyis ni //
T02D2008a:217a-36: sum cu gnyis dang bcu pas bskor //
T02D2008a:217a-37: bgegs dgra'i sbyor bas de ltar bri //
T02D2008a:217a-38: bdag las sprul pa'i khro bo yis //
T02D2008a:217a-39: bsgrub bya lha dang bral nas ni //
T02D2008a:217a-40: rnam shes bsdus la 'khor lor gzhug / zhugs par gyur nas 'khor lo dril //
T02D2008a:217a-41: thod pa gnyis kyi bar du gzhug / shi ba'i skra yi skud pas dkri //
T02D2008a:217a-42: ro bsregs sar ni bsreg shing gis //
T02D2008a:217a-43: me sbar nas ni thod pa bsro //
T02D2008a:217a-44: sngags pas 'greng ste rkang g-yon gyis //
T02D2008a:217a-45: mnan nas yi ge bcu pa bzlas //
T02D2008a:217a-46: ro bsregs la sogs sa 'og gzhug / rim gyis thebs nas 'chi bar 'gyur //
T02D2008a:217a-47: yang na las 'di brtsam par bya //
T02D2008a:217a-48: bsnyen pa la sogs sngar bzhin bya //
T02D2008a:217a-49: dur khrod gzhi mdo shing gcig drung //
T02D2008a:217b-0: sngags @217b pas gnas nas las 'di bya //
T02D2008a:217b-1: grog mkhar chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa //
T02D2008a:217b-2: snang mdzad mi bskyod rus phye dang //
T02D2008a:217b-3: phub ma dur khrod sol ba la //
T02D2008a:217b-4: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad bya //
T02D2008a:217b-5: snying ga lte ba gsang ba dang //
T02D2008a:217b-6: lkog ma dang ni smin mtshams su //
T02D2008a:217b-7: ni rang su yi phur bus gdab //
T02D2008a:217b-8: tshigs rnams tsher ma rnon pos dgang //
T02D2008a:217b-9: thod pa gnyis kyi dbus su gzhug / gnas bdun grog mkhar sa dang dur khrod thal ba la //
T02D2008a:217b-10: gshin rje'i skyes bu khru gang tsam la zhal gcig pa //
T02D2008a:217b-11: mche ba gtsigs pa phyag gnyis ral gri sdigs mdzub zhags //
T02D2008a:217b-12: gcer bu skra grol de yi thugs kar thod pa gzhug / mar gyi brgyad dang bcu bzhi yi //
T02D2008a:217b-13: ro bsregs dur khrod sa dag la //
T02D2008a:217b-14: kha sbub bzlog la lho ru kha bstan 'phred nyal
T02D2008a:217b-15: gzhag / khyim du 'ongs nas khros nas yi ge
T02D2008a:217b-16: bcu pa bzlas // zhag gsum gyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur //
T02D2008a:217b-19: las de byed pa'i dus su ni //
T02D2008a:217b-20: bsam gtan gyis ni 'di ltar bya //
T02D2008a:217b-22: gang la bya ba'i bsgrub bya ste //
T02D2008a:217b-23: ra las bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2008a:217b-24: skra bshig gcer bu byas nas ni //
T02D2008a:217b-25: til mar gyis ni lus bskus nas //
T02D2008a:217b-27: lus las sprul pa'i khro bo yis //
T02D2008a:217b-28: bsgrub bya bcad cing bcom nas ni //
T02D2008a:217b-29: lha rnams dag gis lus la bza' //
T02D2008a:217b-30: slar yang khro bor gyur nas spro //
T02D2008a:217b-31: ral gri dbyug pa gtun shing dang //
T02D2008a:217b-32: 'khor lo tri sh'u la sogs pas //
T02D2008a:217b-33: dum bur bcad cing gtub pa dang //
T02D2008a:217b-34: za shing khrag rnams 'thung bar bsam //
T02D2008a:217b-35: gshin rje yis ni zos par bsam //
T02D2008a:217b-36: gzhan yang srin po sna tshogs dang //
T02D2008a:217b-37: kang ka bya rgod 'ug pa dang //
T02D2008a:217b-38: stag dang seng ge wa dang khyi //
T02D2008a:217b-39: de rnams kyis kyang zos par bsam //
T02D2008a:217b-40: bstod pa sna tshogs byas nas su //
T02D2008a:217b-41: tshig gis kyang ni 'di skad bsgo //
T02D2008a:217b-42: dkon mchog gsum la smod pa dang //
T02D2008a:217b-44: dam tshig 'jigs par byed pa dang //
T02D2008a:217b-46: ngan song gsum du nges par 'gro //
T02D2008a:217b-47: thugs rjes sgrol ba'i dus la bab //
T02D2008a:218a-2: nad dang gnod pa'i sdug bsngal gyis //
T02D2008a:218a-3: tshe 'di nyid la bral bar mdzod //
T02D2008a:218a-4: bsam gtan gyi rim pa phye ba'o //
T02D2008a:218a-5: bla ma'i zhal gyi bka' drin gyis //
T02D2008a:218a-6: 'di byas bsong nams gang thob pa //
T02D2008a:218a-7: 'gro rnams gshin rje gshed lta bu //
T02D2008a:218a-8: 'khor ba las ni thar par shog /
T02D2008a:218a-10: // / slob dpon dzny'a n'a k'a ras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
